title: NITI Aayog launches hackathon with IIM Bangalore and others to accelerate zero-emission truck adoption in India
description: The NITI GearShift Challenge, a hackathon initiated by NITI Aayog and partners, aims to create innovative business models for zero-emission trucks in India. Participants will work on addressing technical, operational, and financial challenges in the adoption of electric trucks.
